entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 1:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
